content:
A spreadsheet is a fantastic tool for tracking and analyzing your online purchases. Here's an example of what your spreadsheet layout could look like:

**Online Purchase Tracker**

**Columns:**

1. **Date**: The date you made the purchase (format: MM/DD/YYYY)
2. **Store**: The online store where you made the purchase (e.g., ASOS, Amazon, etc.)
3. **Category**: The type of item you purchased (e.g., Clothing, Electronics, Books, etc.)
4. **Item Description**: A brief description of the item you purchased
5. **Amount**: The total amount spent on the purchase
6. **Weekday**: The day of the week you made the purchase (e.g., Monday, Tuesday, etc.)
7. **Month**: The month you made the purchase (e.g., January, February, etc.)
8. **Year**: The year you made the purchase

**Example Data:**

| Date | Store | Category | Item Description | Amount | Weekday | Month | Year |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 3/10/2023 | ASOS | Clothing | Women's T-Shirt | $25.00 | Saturday | March | 2023 |
| 3/12/2023 | Amazon | Electronics | Wireless Earbuds | $50.00 | Monday | March | 2023 |
| 3/17/2023 | ASOS | Clothing | Men's Jeans | $40.00 | Friday | March | 2023 |
| 3/24/2023 | ASOS | Clothing | Women's Boots | $60.00 | Saturday | March | 2023 |
| 3/31/2023 | eBay | Collectibles | Vinyl Record | $30.00 | Sunday | March | 2023 |

**Tips:**

* Use a consistent format for the date column (e.g., MM/DD/YYYY) to make it easy to sort and filter.
* Create a drop-down list for the Category column to ensure consistency in your categorization.
* Use the Weekday and Month columns to analyze your spending patterns by day of the week and month.
* Consider adding additional columns to track other information, such as:
	+ **Shipping Cost**: The cost of shipping for each purchase
	+ **Discounts**: Any discounts or promo codes used
	+ **Return**: A flag to indicate if the item was returned

With this layout, you can easily sort and filter your data to gain insights into your online spending habits. For example, you can:

* Sort by Store to see which stores you shop at the most
* Filter by Category to see how much you spend on specific types of items
* Use the Weekday and Month columns to identify patterns in your spending habits
* Calculate your total spending by month or year using formulas

Feel free to customize the layout to fit your specific needs and preferences!
